Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-python, python3-setuptools, python3-all, pybuild-plugin-pyproject, python3-hatchling, python3-hatch-fancy-pypi-readme, python3-typing-extensions <!nocheck>, python3-testfixtures <!nocheck>, python3-pytest <!nocheck>, python3-yaml <!nocheck>, txt2man
Description: Python TUI framework with multi-feature support Python TUI framework with mouse support, modular widget system, customizable and rapid terminal markup language and more! . The framework offers: - Sensible abstractions over most terminal standards - A fully fledged, desktop-inspired window manager system with modals and completely customizable windows - Mouse support out of the box with 0 configuration - YAML (or Python) based styling engines - TIM, one markup language for creating styled terminal text with expressive text, including systems for aliases & macros
